channel.title: Character Files
channel.description:
What are the character files for in the RS cache directory ?
C:\WINDOWS\.jagex_cache_32\user name here.dat
it has a file for each character you have logged in with, even different variations of usernames, ' ' instead of '_', spaces before the actual username etc.

item.title: Character Files
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:9, topic:305416”][quote author=Frell link=topic=401662.msg2976976#msg2976976 date=1254345001]
possibly friends list and other junk you wouldn’t bother to change out of game
[/quote]go away[/quote]
I obviously don’t know so advice taken

Read full topic

item.title: Character Files
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“Metho D, post:8, topic:305416”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=401662.msg2976833#msg2976833 date=1254341786]
What are the character files for in the RS cache directory ?

C:\WINDOWS.jagex_cache_32\user name here.dat

it has a file for each character you have logged in with, even different variations of usernames, ’ ’ instead of ‘_’, spaces before the actual username etc.
[/quote]

Maybe you’ve been using RSBot or another bot that changes the name of random.dat.[/quote]
That’s probably it, they’re all exactly the same size as random.dat

Read full topic

[quote=“eczema3, post:1, topic:305416”]What are the character files for in the RS cache directory ?

C:\WINDOWS.jagex_cache_32\user name here.dat

it has a file for each character you have logged in with, even different variations of usernames, ’ ’ instead of ‘_’, spaces before the actual username etc.[/quote]

Maybe you’ve been using RSBot or another bot that changes the name of random.dat.

item.title: Character Files
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:5, topic:305416”]probably for res settings etc. I really doubt your items are stored on your computer so don’t get your hopes up.[/quote]im pretty sure they are saved in user.home/jagex_runescape_preferences.dat

Read full topic

item.description:
@frank wrote:

[code] Directory of C:\Windows.jagex_cache_32

12/09/2009 10:13 PM .
12/09/2009 10:13 PM …
12/09/2009 10:13 PM bouncedown
06/08/2009 05:29 AM brickabrac
06/08/2009 05:55 AM crazycrystals
06/08/2009 05:13 AM escapevector
01/08/2009 12:35 AM fleacircus
25/06/2009 07:13 PM loginapplet
01/08/2009 01:03 AM pool
01/10/2009 06:46 AM 24 random.dat
05/06/2009 04:12 PM runescape
07/09/2009 06:15 PM speccollect
1 File(s) 24 bytes[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Character Files
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

Log in to rs, then go check the cache directory, there will be a .dat file with your username as the filename, what the fuck is it for?

Read full topic
